array.string: Job Okay
Check with a magnifying glass or Microscope for short solder, dry solder, Not Solder, Not Component, Shift component, Wrong polarity .Make sure soldering is done fine.
Job Okay
Connect flashing fixture with computer system.
Select Receptor flashing file from the program folder.
Load PCB in fixture, select flashbat file from the Flashing folder and double click, wait for completion of Flashing.
Job Okay
Connect the digital multimeter in series with battery in current mode. Make sure the multimeter probe (Black- Ground And Red- mA) is connected.
Check Current - Select Multimeter on mA. When LED is Off-0mA, When LED is on below 2.84mA.
Job Okay
Stick the battery on PCB board.
Cut the wire of battery -2.5cm.
Strip the battery wire and thin it.
Solder the red wire to the positive and Solder the black wire to the negative
Job Okay
Cut the thermistor in 13cm length.
Strip the thermistor in 5mm length.
Tinning the strip thermistor.
Thin the thermistor and solder it.
Job Okay
Take C shape LED , ON /OFF LED pipe , LED sticking fixture and Anabond.
Put C and Round LED pipe with board and stick by anabond
Take 0.5 mm spangle and cut into the two pieces and stick on charger USB connector. Stick inside the round LED pipe also.
Take Mseal, mix it well and stick around the charger connector by using hard blade. Ensure that there is no gap.
Job Okay
Take this PCB, potting gun, syringe, Paper, cloths.
Pot to LED with potting gun.
Ensure that potting material will not spread inside the connector.
Job Okay
Take IP2 needles and hacksaw blade.
Cut the needle 12 cm length by using Hacksaw blade
Job Okay
Clean the handle by compressor air ,followed by filling the handle to remove bur if any.
Clean the inner side of that handle by using cloth.
Job Okay
Take tested ok molded probe.
Check handle fitment and deburr it accordingly.
Pot the molded probe in the handle.
Insert LED pipe in the LED hole or ON/OFF hole.
Stick the Aginova Logos sticker.
Stick the cover plate and weld and grind it.
Take its id and laser print on its cover plate.
once the id is printed, Polish the handle.
Job Okay
Check its polishing.
verify on app if id printed on handle is accurate.
Check logo print.
Check if blue and on/off Led (red) are blinking properly.
Job Okay
Turn on Receptor.
Open the iCelsius app.
Establish connection of Receptor and iCelsius app.
Check temperature on app.
Check charging plug in USB charger Red LED should Blink.
Job Okay
Clean the Probe with damp cloth to remove dust/fingerprints/other marks on enclosure.
Remove the polishing dust from ON/OFF LED hole and Charging LED.
Make sure LEDs are not damaged while cleaning.
Put the Probe in a plastic tube & place it in tray.
Job Okay
Take cleaned Probe, put in the plastic tubes.
Apply tape at all joints.
Using permanent marker write product name, quantity & date of packing,initials of the operator.
Take a suitable packing box and put the batch box in it.
Apply Brown tape, Stick Address of customer and apply Shrink rap tape finaly.
Job Okay
Make invoice, Packaging and Fed-X document.
Save tracking number.
Take a 5-5 prints of invoice and packaging documents.
Also take Address prints.
Job Okay
Turn ON Power button
Turn On Machine.
Turn ON Compressor and AC for cooling purpose.
Fill the mold material in the heating tank.
Put the machine on heating for one hour.
Make sure that pressure gauge is at 80 Pa
Job Okay
Take a probe Molding die, dissemble it for changing insert.
Put the appropriate probe inside and assemble mold
ix the mold on molding machine.
Make sure that Gun and dies are aligned with die and molding machine.
Job Okay
Tighten all the Nut and bolts.
Make sure that mold is fixed properly.
Job Okay
Set the Tank temperature, Gun temperature, Cooling time, injection time, holding time, Eject time, Injection Speed.
Job Okay
Take a tested ok PCB.
Put the PCB in the mold for molding and start the molding by pressing two Green buttons.
According to the set time, molding die will open take out the molding Probe.
Make sure that molded probe is in required shape.
Job Okay
After all the molding probes turn OFF the machine.
Also Turn off the AC and Compressor.
Remove the die and keep it at appropriate place
